#### Rock Creek Soil Moisture Data

#### Prev. Rock Creek Compile (Nov 2020)

```{r}

RC_compile_Nov2020 <- readr::read_csv(file = "RC_SM_Nov2020/compiled_RC_Nov2020.csv", 
                                       col_types = cols(Date = col_character(), .default = col_double())) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(Date = lubridate::ymd_hms(Date))

```

#### New Compile for RC (Feb 2021)

```{r}

compiled_RC_Feb2021 <- process_SM_data(path = "RC_SM_Feb2021", 
                                        site = "RC", prev_compile = RC_compile_Nov2020, written_file_name = "compiled_RC_Feb2021.csv")
```
